name: MLCExecutionOptions
desc: A bitmask that specifies the options you use when executing a graph.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt64)
items.desc: Creates an execution option with the specified raw value.

items.name: static var skipWritingInputDataToDevice: MLCExecutionOptions
items.desc: The option to skip writing input data to device memory.

items.name: static var synchronous: MLCExecutionOptions
items.desc: The option to execute the graph synchronously.

items.name: static var profiling: MLCExecutionOptions
items.desc: The option to return profiling information in the callback before returning from execution.

items.name: static var perLayerProfiling: MLCExecutionOptions
items.desc: The option to enable additional per-layer profiling information using signposts.

items.name: static var forwardForInference: MLCExecutionOptions
items.desc: The option to execute the forward pass for inference only.
